body: I was playing the evolved match 1.7 and it was crashing like 15 crashes... why it is happening?
body_tagged: I was playing the evolved match 1.7 and it was crashing like 15 crashes... why it is happening?
title: WHY IT IS CRASHING

replies.body:
ENGLISH
How much deditated wam do you have on your minecwaft

No really though, how much?
Also, in the UHC your pc sounded like a vaccum, maybe open it up and dust it?
